__e: The one goodness I may achieve in this wretched life will be the timely leaving of it.
Because maybe for once in your miserable life, you'll want to do something decent.
You say a word about this to anyone it'll be the biggest mistake of your little red life.
We have to endure lack of sleep, script by pages, and miserable life to make sure there's no shame in our every minute, every second and keep us reminded of who we are at this moment.
I'm glad he's in pain and miserable and all that.
You're a wretch and we never want to see you again.
He knew my whole pathetic existence.Is it that obvious?
But... i mean, i-- i'll probably go through life miserable, you know?
I know if I give you enough time, pretty soon you're going to slip up and then I'll be able to send you back to your miserable existence.
Well, until you get us some power, I don't have enough energy to completely phase out of your puny existence for a body.
This man standing here is a far cry from the miserable whelp I laid eyes on all those years ago.
I'll tell you exactly what that's got to do with us, you miserable little...
I heard you tell him not to visit you. He was so lost, so miserable, that I forgot I was the idiot and called you.
A great way to get the things you want is to be so miserable, you don't want them anymore.
I wanted to take you down, I wanted to make you as miserable as I am and that's exactly what I did!
